titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Anaheim Ducks for winning the 2007 Stanley Cup Championship.
A resolution congratulating the Anaheim Ducks for winning the 2007 Stanley Cup Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Anaheim Ducks for winning their first Stanley Cup Championship and the first Stanley Cup Championship in California history.
